Package Cmp3\PDF

Cross Media Publishing - CMP3 www.cross-media.net

Class summary

Exception main source exception
ContentBox Creates a simple pdf with a content area defined by configuration.
HtmlInsertHiresImages Content processors which rewrite image sources using hires images from uploads/
Css Parses CSS and can give styles for a given css selector.
Box It can set the media, crop, bleed, trim, and art box on pages of a PDF file.
Shrink Shrink a PDF
InfoData Object that provides meta data about an pdf file
Info PDF meta data info using pdfinfo
Ghostscript Plain Ghostscript processor where parameter has to be set to do anything
Overlay Handles the PDF overlay using pdftk
Merge Handles the PDF merging using pdftk
Impose Imposes pages of a pdf file using podofoimpose
